name: proxmox-mcp-server
description: AI agent for managing Proxmox Virtual Environment infrastructure. Provides comprehensive control over VMs, containers, storage, nodes, and cluster resources through the Proxmox VE API.

parameters.PROXMOX_HOST: Proxmox server hostname or IP address
Proxmox server hostname or IP address

capabilities.name: list_nodes
capabilities.description: List all nodes in the Proxmox cluster

capabilities.name: get_node_status
capabilities.description: Get status and resource usage for a specific node

skills.description: Complete VM lifecycle and snapshot management

capabilities.name: list_vms
capabilities.description: List all virtual machines (node-specific or cluster-wide)

capabilities.name: get_vm_config
capabilities.description: Get configuration for a specific VM

capabilities.name: get_vm_status
capabilities.description: Get current status of a VM

capabilities.name: start_vm
capabilities.description: Start a virtual machine

capabilities.name: stop_vm
capabilities.description: Force stop a virtual machine

capabilities.name: shutdown_vm
capabilities.description: Gracefully shutdown a virtual machine (ACPI shutdown)

capabilities.name: reboot_vm
capabilities.description: Reboot a virtual machine

capabilities.name: create_vm_snapshot
capabilities.description: Create a snapshot of a VM

capabilities.name: list_vm_snapshots
capabilities.description: List all snapshots of a VM

capabilities.name: delete_vm_snapshot
capabilities.description: Delete a VM snapshot

capabilities.name: list_containers
capabilities.description: List all LXC containers on a node

capabilities.name: get_container_status
capabilities.description: Get status of an LXC container

capabilities.name: start_container
capabilities.description: Start an LXC container

capabilities.name: stop_container
capabilities.description: Stop an LXC container

capabilities.name: list_storage
capabilities.description: List all storage devices

capabilities.name: get_storage_status
capabilities.description: Get status of a specific storage device

capabilities.name: list_tasks
capabilities.description: List running and recent tasks

capabilities.name: get_task_status
capabilities.description: Get status of a specific task

capabilities.name: get_cluster_status
capabilities.description: Get overall cluster status and resources
